/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a two-lane road stretching into the distance, flanked by trees on both sides. The road, bathed in the soft light of the day, is devoid of any vehicles, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking down the road towards the horizon, giving a sense of depth and distance. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
